title: HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONAL
description:
A HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL (“HCP”) is a natural person that is a member of the medical, dental, pharmacy or nursing professions or any other person who, in the course of his or her professional activities, may prescribe, purchase, supply, recommend or administer a medicinal product.
(See 100-BIP-00415 and HCCApp for additional local requirements: https://shareroom1.eu.boehringer.com/de/hccapp/SitePages/Home.aspx)

hcxFlag.title: hcxFlag
hcxFlag.description:
The HCx Flag indicates that a Business Partner has spend on BI's behalf. 
If the flag is set, this Business Partner record will be forwarded to the CCT (Clinical Cost Tracking) modul in BI's CTMS system.
